main event: An observer traveling on Kansas Highway 57 spotted a light in the sky that appeared to look like a quarter of a moon, which changed colors and descended vertically before disappearing.
interesting points: The observer stopped his car as the UFO stopped in the air 25 yards in front of him., The UFO changed color from orange to red during observation., The sighting lasted for about four minutes., The UFO was reported to have descended to an altitude of ten to fifteen feet., The object traveled due west before disappearing to the southwest.
sighted object: a light in the sky resembling a quarter of a moon
